member.name: T:Google.Api.Ads.AdWords.Headers.RequestHeader
member.summary: This class wraps the , adding cross-namespace serialization capabilities.
member.remarks: The XmlSerializer provides two mutually exclusive ways of serialization. - Mark a class as Serializable, and allow the class to be serialized automagically. This option does object serialization correctly, but isn't cross-namespace aware. - Implement IXmlSerializable, and customize the serialization. This option allows us to customize the serialization process and add cross namespace support. However since options 1 and 2 are mutually exclusive (i.e. cannot be applied to the same object hierarchy), we cannot derive this class from , instead, we have to wrap it in another class.
